write.wordCountWarning: Your essay should be at least {min} words but not more than {max} words.

letterGuidelines.salutation: Include an appropriate salutation (Dear Sir/Madam or Dear [Name])
letterGuidelines.paragraphs: Structure your letter with clear paragraphs
letterGuidelines.language: Use formal or informal language as appropriate
letterGuidelines.address: End with an appropriate closing (Yours faithfully/sincerely)

essayGuidelines.structure: Include an introduction, body paragraphs, and conclusion
essayGuidelines.position: Clearly state your position on the topic
essayGuidelines.support: Support your arguments with examples and evidence
essayGuidelines.vocabulary: Use a range of vocabulary and sentence structures
